name: P16_30s
prompt: suburban home driveway and front yard, viewed from an elevated position on the garage, looking down at the driveway at dusk. Fading natural light mixed with activated porch lights, long shadows. An unfamiliar dark sedan, license plate visible, tinted windows, parks in driveway. Vehicle pulls into driveway, person exits and walks toward the front door. Static elevated viewpoint, wide field of view covering driveway and street approach, slight barrel distortion at edges, Transitional lighting quality, warm tones, automatic exposure adjusting. Real-time speed, natural fluid human motion at 1x playback rate.
negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, artifacts, glitches, distorted, unrealistic motion, multiple camera angles, jump cuts, visible camera, security camera device, doorbell camera, camera lens visible, camera equipment, camera housing, surveillance camera in frame, camera mount, camera on wall, camera on ceiling, camera rig, recording device in shot, gopro, webcam, CCTV camera visible, Ring doorbell visible, Nest camera visible, slow motion, time lapse, fast forward, sped up, slowed down
